metadata.title: CVE-2023-6228 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was found in the tiffcp utility distributed by the libtiff packagewhere a crafted TIFF file on processing may cause a heap-based bufferoverflow leads to an application crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.1+git230720-4ubuntu1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.1+git230720-4ubuntu1
libtiff6 - 4.5.1+git230720-4ubuntu1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.1+git230720-4ubuntu1
No subscription required
